snippet: The Nassau County district attorney said a retired police lieutenant who shot an off-duty federal agent “clearly did not enter this situation with the intent to use deadly physical force.”
abstract: Nassau County District Atty Kathleen M Rice says that no criminal charges will be filed against retired police lieutenant Christopher Geraghty, who shot and killed off-duty federal agent John Capano; Capano tried to intervene in a pharmacy robbery in Seaford in December and was mistaken by Geraghty as a suspect.
lead_paragraph: The Nassau County district attorney said a retired police lieutenant who shot an off-duty federal agent “clearly did not enter this situation with the intent to use deadly physical force.”

headline.seo: No Charges in Agent’s Friendly Fire Death on Long Island
headline.main: No Charges in a Federal Agent’s Death on Long Island
headline.print_headline: No Charges in a Federal Agent’s Death on Long Island
